snippet: Gleacher & Company confirmed on Friday that it had ended attempts to sell itself, at least for the moment, but that it had agreed to sell its mortgage lending unit to Ocwen Financial.
abstract: Gleacher & Company confirmed on Friday that it had ended attempts to sell itself, at least for the moment, but that it had agreed to sell its mortgage lending unit to Ocwen Financial.

headline.main: Gleacher Confirms It Has Called Off Sales Process
